snippet: Ari Brand, who has a starring role in the Off Broadway adaptation of Chaim Potok’s “My Name Is Asher Lev,” talks about the play and his “Broadway Bound” disappointment three years ago.
abstract: Excerpts from a conversation with actor Ari Brand, who is currently starring in the Off Broadway play My Name is Asher Lev.
lead_paragraph: Ari Brand, who has a starring role in the Off Broadway adaptation of Chaim Potok’s “My Name Is Asher Lev,” talks about the play and his “Broadway Bound” disappointment three years ago.

headline.seo: Ari Brand on ‘My Name Is Asher Lev’
headline.main: Rebounding Off Broadway, After a Detour
headline.print_headline: Rebounding Off Broadway, After a Detour
